Package polimi.ingsw.view.flow

Class UI

java.lang.Object
polimi.ingsw.view.flow.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
GUI, TUI
public abstract class UI extends Object
This class is father to both the TUI and GUI implementation
it implements methods that everyone needs to have
